review: She is simple ,great human being, friendly approach.. satisfied her consultant ,with her smiling face selfless service

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I took my daughter for her first delivery, pre and post natal care to Dr. Vasanthi. She is very soft spoken, explained my daughter's condition at each and every step of consultation and labour. She was very encouraging and ensured my daughter's normal delivery,  though the baby had fetal distress and my daughter developed post natal hypotension. The  immediate intervention and quick decisions of the doctor brought back their conditions to normalcy. The delivery was conducted at RPS  Hospital, where Dr. Vasanthi is a gynaec consultant. Both the clinic and hospital staff  were very hospitable and cordial. We are extremely happy that we entrusted my daughter's delivery into safe and caring hands.
reply_text: Thank u so much üôè. Means a lot

review: I referred doctor for pcod problem. I received a friendly treatment with her.she explained me a clear manner of my problem and cause for the problem.she was so kind and soft while treating the patients.Even the facilities available for scaning procedure which makes us more comfortable.The clicnic was so hygienic and compelety save.The way they caring for patients is so happy to see such kind of doctor.It is so rare to find out such kind of doctor that combines a personal touch and care for that patients.I personally recommend others to visit her for a great full experience.In this pandamic situation ,I felt very comfortable to visit the doctor because of the precautions in clinic.

I had very great experience as a first timer the staffs were very polite and helpful when I checked in.The hospital is maintained at its best and  has a pleasant environment.
Dr.vasanthi  is extremely  professional and knowledgeable, she takes very keen interest and care on your health and ensure to keep us updated about it. I specially liked how Dr would spend her time to explain my conditions and treatment options ,she is very concerned. I'm so glad  that I chose SWASAM and would highly recommend to any women out there.!!!!!

Dr.Vasanthi is very polite and listens to all your issues and notes  down all  of your past history  and gives you a proper treatment.very much friendly and the way she explains you the treatment for the problem makes us feel much better. Whatever is the issue she will make sure you get the proper treatment and if its not under her treatment she suggests a correct doctor for the treatment . I highly recommend all women who are having any gynaecology issues can get treatment from her and you will get what need to be done.

I'm very happy after visiting Swasam speciality clinic , I have undergone infertility treatment with Dr Vasanthi, she listened to our issues patiently and explained the causes and treatment. she is very kind, her step by step instructions is great . Scan and laboratory services available in the clinic which is very comfortable. The clinic experience is awesome, they all follow strict & safety protocols.

I'm very happy with the treatment undergone, visited for gynec problem. she is listening to our problems carefully and gave the step by step advices , causes and remedies. I strongly suggest her for all gynecologist problems üëç.in clinical experience is very nice including pharmacy.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,

Awesome üòäüëç treatment and good ambiance,  and I am happy to refer my friends.                           
Thanks
